name: Olympics Data Analysis
desc: Interactive data analysis dashboard to explore historical Olympics data. Built using Python, Pandas, Plotly, and Streamlit. Features visual insights by medals, countries, and sports.

name: RAG Multisource Assistant
desc: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation assistant that accepts YouTube links, PDFs, or text input, and answers queries using a vector database. Built using Python, Streamlit, LangChain, FAISS, and OpenAI APIs.

name: Potato Leaf Disease Classifier
desc: A deep learning model for classifying potato leaf diseases using image data. Built with Python, TensorFlow, Keras, and OpenCV. Achieved high accuracy on multiple disease classes through CNN-based architecture.

name: Fashion MNIST Classifier
desc: Image classification model trained on the Fashion MNIST dataset to categorize clothing items such as shirts, sneakers, bags, and more. Built using Python, TensorFlow, and Keras.

name: House Price Prediction
desc: A machine learning model to predict house prices based on various features like area, location, number of rooms, etc. Built using Python, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, and Matplotlib for visualization.
